title: Lifting
creator_credit: George Wynn and CWS Film Unit for Ministry of Labour
brief_description: Thousands of men and women injure themselves in lifting or moving heavy weights. This films shows the right way to tackle a number of jobs so as to avoid accidents and strains and to make the jobs themselves easier.
creator_credit_for_label: George Wynn and CWS Film Unit for Ministry of Labour
